title: Personal Narrative Craft
description: A reading and craft class designed to explore writing of all forms of personal experience narrative, including journals, autobiography, firsthand biography, and firsthand chronicle. Readings and lectures will accompany writing exercises. Restricted to major codes LT34 and LT42 and minor codes LT34 and LT39 during first pass of registration. All other students may register during second pass of registration with the approval of the department.  Prerequisites:  LTWR 8A or 8B or 8C.
